name: Hercules Edit Most Recent Post
author: Todd D. Nestor - todd.nestor@gmail.com

sections.description:
Adds a direct link to publish the most recently published post to the Posts menu. I was trying to go in and edit my most recent post and I realized that it is something I do often. I normally have to go to the posts page and then press the link to edit the most recently published post. So I decided to save myself a step and add a direct link, thought others might like it too.

Maybe in a future version I’ll provide options to add direct links to edit other recently published posts.
sections.installation: Add this plugin by uploading the zip using the “Add Plugin” feature built into WordPress. Otherwise manaully unzip the folder and upload the entire directory to your blog’s plugins folder ( /wp-content/plugins/ ). Next you have to activate the plugin.
sections.faq:
Where do I see the new link?

If you hover over the posts menu item in the wp-admin area it should be the last link in the submenu.

short_description: Hercules Edit Most Recent Post simply adds a link to the Posts submenu in the wp-admin area to edit the most recent post.
